parameters.description: The context that describes the current test
The current engine status for the test
The current test state
The instance of the test class

children.remarks: This method must never throw. Behavior is undefined if it does. Instead, exceptions that occur should be recorded in the aggregator in ctxt and will be reflected in a way that's appropriate based on when this method is called.
children.summary: Sets the test context for the given test state and engine status.

content.value: protected virtual bool ShouldTestRun(TContext ctxt)
Protected Overridable Function ShouldTestRun(ctxt As TContext) As Boolean

parameters.description: The context that describes the current test

children.remarks: This method runs during and any exceptions thrown will contribute to test failure.
children.summary: Override this to determine whether a test should be run or not (meaning, if you return false, it will be reported with a status of ). By default, this method will return true. This is typically used to implement the ability to exclude specific tests unless they've been explicitly asked to be run.

content.value: protected void UpdateTestContext(object? testClassInstance, TestResultState? testState = null)
Protected Sub UpdateTestContext(testClassInstance As Object, testState As TestResultState = Nothing)

children.summary: Updates the test context values while the test is running, without swapping out the test context itself. This preserves the values in the existing context (notably, the cancellation token, which is wrapped and passed, and as such cannot be replaced).

summary: A base class that provides default behavior when running a test. This includes support for skipping tests.
remarks: This class does not make any assumptions about what it means to run an individual test, just that at some point, the test will be run. The intention with this base class is that it can serve as a base for non-traditional tests (e.g., tests that are not derived from invoking CLR methods).

content.value: public abstract class TestRunnerBase<TContext, TTest> where TContext : TestRunnerBaseContext<TTest> where TTest : class, ITest
Public MustInherit Class TestRunnerBase(Of TContext As TestRunnerBaseContext(Of TTest), TTest As {Class, ITest})

typeParameters.description: The context type used by the runner
The test type used by the test framework. Must derive from .
